## Locating Ourselves

## Goals for the Semester

We will follow the same general format as last semester - a mix of DSUP-initiated sessions and facilitated workshop-within-a-seminar sessions focused on writing for funding.

- Identify appropriate funding opportunities
- Develop a response based upon funding parameters
- Manage proposals after disposition
- Communicate impact to multiple audiences

## Expectations

-   Full engagement
-   Submit work on time
